tweet: .@LindseyGrahamSC referred to $4B in loan forgiveness for farmers of color in #COVID relief bill as reparations. "If you are a White woman, no forgiveness. That's reparations," he said. He should be asked about who traditionally has benefited from Farm Bill and o/ ag subsidies.
name: Eva McKend

tweet: The Covid relief bill could be the most significant piece of legislation for Black farmers since the Civil Rights Act. Read @lreiley’s latest for @washingtonpost and join us tonight for an interview with an impacted farmer.  https://t.co/L7kYnnfp7i
name: Zerlina on Peacock

tweet: Lindsay Graha, says the aid to Black farmers in the Covid relief bill is “reparations.” It’s not but let’s say, for sake of argument, that it is. How is that a bad thing??? Oh, he was signaling wypipo!
name: Touré

tweet: The pandemic has had a disproportionate impact on Black Americans, on both lives & livelihoods.  I'm proud that our bill includes this historic provision that will support our community's Black farmers & at large agricultural sector, vital to our economy.   https://t.co/xKkNrZYTqO
name: Chrissy Houlahan

tweet: .@SenToomey has specifically denounced this program and said it's not necessary. Here's why that's wrong: Relief bill is most significant legislation for Black farmers since Civil Rights Act, experts say  https://t.co/CMJ9oZ4sOG

tweet: Almost all of Trump's trade bailout went to white farmers  A little-noticed piece of Biden's relief bill devotes ~$5B to disadvantaged/black farmers  "It’s reparations, but it’s more than that. It is historic"  Incredible story by @lreiley    https://t.co/4UtnbRojNo
name: Jeff Stein

tweet: Biden's relief bill is most significant legislation for Black farmers since the Civil Rights Act, experts say.  $5 billion would go to farmers of color, who've lost 90% of their land over the past century due to systemic discrimination and a cycle of debt.  https://t.co/4Xp8nKOQns
name: Kyle Griffin
